about_the_game:
Umbra Sepulcri is an action game inspired by metroidvania genre, featuring a necromancer and his struggling with greed and death, you need to gather the souls of the dead, witness their last moments of life and summon them, unleashing their power to defeat your enemies. Collect the souls of your enemies and get new weapons that match your fighting style. Live a deep story and face the consequences of your choices.

Features:

  • Metroidvania: Discover a corrupt world full of enemies, traps and puzzles, unlocking new areas and abilities along the way.
  • Non-Linear Storytelling: Unravel the mysteries of the world depending on which path you choose to take, will you be able to change your destiny?
  • Fighting: Tough combat, opt for weapons that suit your play style and perform devastating and spectacular combos.
  • Right Hand of Charon: Unleash the power of souls against your enemies or release them into the river of the dead.
  • From pencil to screen: Hand drawn 2D animations, in illustration style and dozens of Comic Book stories.
  • Spine-tingling story: A deep and captivating story, delivered in Comic Book style.


Unlock new primary and secondary weapons each of which has its own unique attack range, speed and power. Acquire devastating new skills and special moves to slaughter your foes. And don't forget the souls, they are always at your service!




Souls stagnate in the world, corrupting it. Give peace to these entities before their torment turns them into dreadful creatures. Discover their story by reliving their last moments in life and use their power to smash some heads.




Overcome the challenges before you, reading the attacks of the opponents to survive formidable battles. Defeat these powerful enemies and subdue their souls to take them by you side. Vae Victis!




A deeply emotional story about greed and sacrifice will unravel as you tangles with strong bosses and environmental hazards, traversing forests, mountains and deserts in search of the cause that dried up the stream of souls of the Styx, the river of the dead.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: You are a necromancer. The souls of the dead are your weapon. Push the limits of your combat skills in this story-driven, action packed Metroidvania. Enter in a dark world, where the sun's rays no longer heat up and evil creatures roam free in the night.
